data: {"title": "Convenience", "content": "Access the platform at the convenience of your home, office or even while on holiday.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "__localized_fields": ["title", "content"], "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"title": "Control over finances", "content": "Gives you control over your finances and allows you to easily manage your money.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "__localized_fields": ["title", "content"], "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"title": "Access statements", "content": "Check your balance, access your mini statements and track your bank to bank transfers.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "__localized_fields": ["title", "content"], "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Letters Of Credit (LCS)", "content": "A Letter of Credit is issued by the Bank at the request of the customer (applicant/importer) where the Bank undertakes to pay the beneficiary/exporter for goods and services, provided the beneficiary presents all documents called for and meets all other terms and conditions set out in the LCs. Requirements
  • A pro-forma invoice.
  • Import Declaration Form (IDF).
  • Insurance (if cover is local).
", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Documentary Collections", "content": "This is a method of payment used whereby an exporter entrusts the handling of commercial and often financial documents to a Bank and gives the bank instructions concerning the release of these documents to the importer. Requirements for payment
  • Declaration for imports or Custom’s entry form.
  • Import Declaration Form (IDF).
  • Copy of the Clean Report of Findings (if called for).
    • Requirements for Processing
    • Customers letter of instructions.
    • The collection documents.
    ", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Guarantees", "content": "This is a written irrevocable undertaking issued by the bank to pay the beneficiary on demand in the event that the customer has not fulfilled his/her contract obligations and a specific sum of money with in the validity of the guarantee. KCB guarantees are acceptable locally and internationally. These include: Bid Bonds (secured & Secured up to UGX 500M), Performance Guarantees, Advance Payment Guarantees, Retention Bonds, Supplier and payment .", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Import Loans", "content": "This is a short term financing offered strictly to importers. These include traders that import raw materials for their own use or resale. The loan and interest is paid from the sale of import loans. Loan proceeds are transferred directly to supplier.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Invoice Discounting / Certificate Discounting", "content": "This is a facility given to a client against the outstanding invoices/certificates that are awaiting payments. The bank discounts up to 70% of the invoice or certificate amount by availing the amount immediately on confirmation and this is then cleared on receipt of the payments from the invoiced party who undertakes to remit the invoice amount directly to the bank.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Contract Financing", "content": "This is a facility granted to a borrower based on contracts that the client has been awarded and payment is expected upon completion or part completion of the project to the buyer.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "LPO Financing", "content": "This is a facility granted to a borrower based on contracts / Purchase that the client has been awarded and payment is expected upon completion or part completion of the project to the buyer.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Regular Savings", "content": "
  • Customers can deposit as low as UGX 500 any time of the day.
  • Interest earned is 5% per annum and interest payout is every seven days.
  • Customers can deposit or withdraw at no cost using their Airtel Money Wallet.
  • Customers can view mini-statements with the last 4 transactions.
  • No limit to the life span of the savings account.
  • No account set up fees or minimum balance is required.
  • Customers can withdraw any amount within the mobile money limits from their regular savings Account on demand with no fee or penalty.
", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Fixed Deposits", "content": "
  • Customers can make free deposits to a fixed deposit account, minimum deposit amount is UGX 250,000.
  • The fixed deposit account will consist of 3, 6 and 12 months investment period.
  • Customers will earn interest based on selected tenor period.
  • Customer has the option of withdrawing funds from the fixed deposit or making a premature termination at a penalty of reduced interest.
  • Interest will be paid at maturity of the tenure period.
  • No transaction fees will be charged for depositing or withdrawing from the fixed deposit account.
  • No limit to the life span of the fixed account.
", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Treasury Bids & Bonds", "content": "Looking for a stable and risk-free way to grow your money? Treasury Bills and Bonds are a surefire investment that can be a stable source of income. KCB invest in Treasury Bills and Bonds on your behalf.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Call Deposits", "content": "Sign up for Call Deposit; an interest-bearing investment account that allows you to withdraw your money from the account without a penalty, at a moment’s notice. Enjoy the various benefits, such as withdrawing from your account without prior notification to the bank.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Fixed Deposits", "content": "Grow your money with our Fixed Deposit account. Our competitive interest rate will have you reach your goal faster. The interest applies to local and foreign currencies; and will only be accrued if the money remains in the account for the agreed tenor.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Short-Term Credit Loans", "content": "You can borrow short term loans with or without an approved loan in place. They are extended for up to 6 months, with their interest rates determined by the Treasury Bill.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

  • One must be an account holder with KCB./li> \n
  • For non customers, a limit of USD 5,000 is the maximum amount that can be exchanged.

{"seo": [], "title": "What major foreign exchange currencies does KCB deal in?", "content": "KCB deals in the following currencies; U.S Dollar(USD), British Sterling Pound(GBP), Euro (EUR), Japanese Yen(JPY), Canadian Dollar (CAD), Kenyan Shilling(KES), Tanzanian Shilling (TZS) ,Rwandan Franc(RWF).", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "What's the minimum tenor for a fixed deposit?", "content": "Minimum tenor for a fixed deposit is one month.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Can a customer terminate a fix deposit before a maturity date?", "content": "Yes, customers can terminate a fix deposit before the maturity dayte, however, the interest to be earned will be foregone.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Can a customer open a Central Securities Depository( CSD )account in KCB", "content": "Yes a customer can open a CSD account, but should have a Uganda Shillings (UGX) account with KCB.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

  • One coloured passport photo
    • \n
  • National ID/Passport 3. KCB UGX account
", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Can a customer invest in government securities?", "content": "Yes a customer cana invest in government securities, but should have a Central Securities Depository (CSD) account opened through KCB.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "What Treasury services does KCB offer?", "content": "
  • Foreign exchange (simultaneous purchase or sale of two different currencies).
  • Retailing of government securities in the secondary market.
  • Money market services (Fixed Deposits).
    • For more information , please contact our Treasury Team on 0417-118232/302/260/261/259/256", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Working Capital Loans", "content": "Your business needs to be liquid in order to run its day-to-day processes. We are here to ensure that operations run smoothly so you can focus on providing the best service while growing your business. Benefits Flexibility in withdrawal
  • The customer can draw money as needed from time to time, as long as the overdraft limit is not exceeded.
Low cost
  • The cost of borrowing is low, since interest is only charged on the overdrawn balance.
Improved liquidity
  • It improves the customers’ liquidity position, allowing the business to run smoothly.
", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Seasonal Loans", "content": "Don’t be caught in a mess. If you have a business emergency or need to service a particular need, then this is the financial plan for you. With the great rates and quick approval, you will literally be saving time and money.

Benefits

Friendly terms Pay back the loan flexibly over a period of 6 months. Quick approval Enjoy a quicker approval and disbursement process for your loan and have your cash almost instantly.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Project Financing", "content": "Choose financing with great terms. We offer you long term loans for your projects or acquisition of infrastructure based on your projections. It doesn’t get any better than that.

Benefits

Allows you to run your project
  • It gives you the ability to get financing that is not tied to the project sponsor’s ability.
Tailored to project
  • Get a loan that is structured and driven by the specific characteristics of each project.
", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Mortgage", "content": "Part of our support is helping you get the perfect premises for your business. We advance this loan for both construction and the purchase of commercial properties and estates. Pick whatever suits your business.

Benefits

Attractive group and staff packages
  • Specially packaged staff mortgage facilities for companies & co-operative societies and organized groups.
70% financing
  • Get up to 70% financing of the amount your require for your mortgage.
Access to a members’ club
  • Be a member of the S&L Developers Club and enjoy trips to China, Dubai & other markets to see latest trends.
Have your property showcased
  • Gain access to S&L Developers Club bus tours where your property is showcased to potential customers.
", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Syndicated Term Loans", "content": "Looking for long-term financing for a large project? A syndicated term loan is the best bet. Being a curation of various lenders, it works perfectly for both parties, allowing for diversification of credit risk for the bank and the full funding for the customer.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Corporate Bonds", "content": "Through investing in bonds, you can raise funds for your short to medium term projects. With our expertise, we enable our clients to obtain financing for long-term projects and large ticket expenditure programs.

Benefits

Improved returns on project
  • By lowering the cost of funds you will obtain a fixed or floating rate pricing from the market, thus improving the total return from your project.
Enjoy a fixed rate Obtain fixed rate pricing from the bond market and thus lock-in your funding costs for the duration of the borrowing period.", "updated_by": 3, "alt_seo_options": null, "sitemap_priority": null, "alt_seo_meta_title": null, "alt_social_options": null, "alt_seo_social_image": null, "alt_seo_social_title": null, "exclude_from_sitemap": false, "alt_seo_canonical_url": null, "alt_seo_meta_description": null, "alt_seo_social_description": null}

{"seo": [], "title": "Installment sales", "content": "Through this form of financing, you will be able to acquire for your business machinery or movable assets, which will be jointly registered and co-owned with the bank.

Benefits

Low capital required
  • Relatively low initial capital will be required from the customer. Asset treated like customer’s
    • For tax purposes, the asset is ‘on-balance sheet’ i.e. it is treated as though it belongs to the customer.
    Customer benefits
    • The customer qualifies for interest, wear and tear deductions and any applicable investment allowances.
    Eventual customer ownership
    • Ownership of the asset will be passed on to the customer after receipt of the final payment.
